overview_of_class: Chemical analysis of real samples using basic laboratory techniques, including titration, colorimetric analysis, density measurements, and atomic spectroscopy. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on theseexperiments. Must be taken concurrently with Chem 101-0.
name: General Chemistry Laboratory
title: WCAS CHEM 121-0-33 General Chemistry Laboratory
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 101-0.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Chemical analysis of real samples using basic laboratory techniques, including titration, colorimetric analysis, density measurements, and atomic spectroscopy. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on theseexperiments. Must be taken concurrently with Chem 101-0.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Students enrolled in Chemistry 121-0 MUST also enroll in Chemistry 101-0.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Electronic Lab Notebook (details to be provided in course syllabus)
2. Approved laboratory safety eyewear
3. 100% Cotton laboratory coat

Items 2 and 3 will be sold during the first week of classes. Details TBA.

subject: CHEM
